original_text: All the days of his separation shall he eat nothing that is made of the vine tree, from the kernels even to the husk.
korean_text: 자기 몸을 구별하는 모든 날 동안에는 포도나무 소산은 씨나 껍질이라도 먹지 말지며

sentences.original_text: All the days of his separation
that is made of the vine tree
from the kernels even to the husk
